description: This is an easy but impressive standby for a light supper or lunch dish. Serve with a green salad.
name: Cheesy Soufflé Omelette Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g grated mature cheese, such as cheddar (any strong cheese will be good)

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the egg whites to soft peaks. In a separate bowl, whisk the cream and Parmesan into the egg yolks and season well. Fold in the egg whites gently until they are well combined.

Heat the butter in a 25cm non-stick frying pan. Add the egg mixture and cook over a low heat for 5 minutes, until the sides have set, without moving it. Scatter the cheese over the omelette and carefully fold it in half.
Continue to cook for another couple of minutes, then turn it out onto a plate and rest it for a minute or two. The middle will continue to cook as it rests. Cut in half to serve.
